data.name: Valor
data.detailed_description:
This is a fun online multiplayer battle royal game, you can play against your friends and try to get the epic victory. In this game, you drop out of a plane and fight each other until only 1 remains alive, try to stay alive while the deadly zone closes in. Do keep in mind, that this game is still in the early stages of development and therefore there will be loads of updates and changes.

Join the Discord here for help with the game or ask questions: https://discord.gg/JH9DvKxV6F
data.about_the_game:
This is a fun online multiplayer battle royal game, you can play against your friends and try to get the epic victory. In this game, you drop out of a plane and fight each other until only 1 remains alive, try to stay alive while the deadly zone closes in. Do keep in mind, that this game is still in the early stages of development and therefore there will be loads of updates and changes.

Join the Discord here for help with the game or ask questions: https://discord.gg/JH9DvKxV6F
data.short_description: Valor is a fun online multiplayer game, you can fight your friends to the death until only 1 remains while the deadly zone closes in and tries to kill you. Valor is still in development and will be getting loads of updates and changes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i-5 8th gen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1070 ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
